content.raw:
You can try calling its API directly using the example [here](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/maps-static/get-api-key)

I did a quick test got this msg:

```
The Google Maps Platform server rejected your request. You must enable Billing on the Google Cloud Project at https://console.cloud.google.com/project/_/billing/enable.Learn more at https://developers.google.com/maps/gmp-get-started
```

Not sure if this is the case for you. Enabling billing was not a requirement before at the time when this plugin was implemented. If the cause of the issue is the same for you, we should update the tutorial.
